## FunctionInputNode.getSerializationCls() method

Gets the serialization descriptor for this node type

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSerializationCls(): SerializableClass;
```
**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

Serialization class descriptor

## Remarks

Serializes the parameter type and name. The type has an enumeration constraint limited to valid shader types.
